message.body: ##### You've been on my mind a lot these days. Sorry I haven't been in touch. I know you've been busy too - lots of Gordy time, eh? Not sure when you're heading to ####### but wanted to wish you a safe trip. If we don't connect before you take off, see you when you get back for beers and catching up. xxS

Hey thanks, I have been unexpectedly ###########################issues and have had to see #################### for days. So I have had my mind only on that recently. Good news is that I just have ################################# for it now. My #######s ok after some tests. The ############################## than they should be.
I have a lot to do before I leave on the 16 so I probably will have to catch up when I get back
Hope you have a good Holliday if I don't bump into you before I leave.

Shit, sorry to hear about your #############. Thank God for #######though. Without 'em, I'd be a mess - crippled, basically; my Rheumatoid Arthritis can be a bitch. Happy Holidays to you too, and big hugs. Have fun in ######!!!
Ugg, I hope I don't get arthritis, that's a ruff time. Thanks for the good vibes.

After a while, you get used to all the medical ailments that get tossed your way. It's not so bad. We're all gonna bite the bullet eventually anyway. As they say, what doesn't kill ya, makes you stronger! Weeeeee!!!! See ya in a few weeks
